title: #NFT budget, how to invest till August?
body:
How to invest the 2.6ETH received from NFT(Villa in Ibiza) sold on opensea?
At the end of August Trips needs to send money (5.2k€)  to the Host of the Villa in Ibiza.
This proposal is to get from Trips community the better way to invest this budget for a potential gain and safe the budget ....we hope! :-) 
 
https://opensea.io/assets/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/93380629908989276154329187712159695682604484101294988604591734364126547279873

open for good discussion on #Nft-Nights  (discord)  here the proposal: 

1) Keep 2.6eth running till end of August and stake it (to confirm where to stake)

2) Buy stable and put the stable in stake (to confirm which stable and which Dex,Cex)

3) buy DOGE and pray 

4) Keep running the 2.6eth, when u reach 5k€ value sold in Stable and put in stake, Trips will find a way to cover the loss of 200€ till end of August

5) Sell a part of ETH (x) in Stable and stake it. to define which % of ETH to sell and when.
choices: keep ETH and set a SL at 5k
Sell part in Stable and stake
author: 0x052C68ABE8e4BF0b78925E488B98f6fdc18A3AF9
